column4: FOCUS-Zara looks to technology to keep up with faster fashion
column5: MADRID  June 15 The pioneer of fast fashion isn't looking so fast anymore.

column4: Apple  Qualcomm battle over possible ban on some U.S. iPhone imports
column5: The staff of the U.S. International Trade Commission on Friday recommended that a trade judge find that Apple Inc  infringed at least one of Qualcomm Inc's  patents  a move that could lead to blocking the import of some iPhones.

column4: Apple  Qualcomm battle over possible ban on some U.S. iPhone imports
column5: June 15 The staff of the U.S. International Trade Commission on Friday recommended that a trade judge find that Apple Inc infringed at least one of Qualcomm Inc's patents  a move that could lead to blocking the import of some iPhones.

column4: Wall Street ends high-volume session lower on trade jitters
column5: NEW YORK Wall Street stocks ended lower on Friday  capping a day of heavy trading with investors mostly pulling back from initial concerns over an escalating trade dispute between the United States and China. | Video

column4: Qualcomm-NXP deal still waiting for China nod: sources
column5: BEIJING/SHANGHAI China is yet to approve U.S. chipmaker Qualcomm Inc's  proposed $44 billion acquisition of NXP Semiconductors   three people close to the talks said  dismissing an earlier media report that said Beijing had already greenlit the deal. | Video

column5: * U.S. to implement 25 pct tariffs on $50 bln of Chinese goods

column4: UPDATE 4-Qualcomm-NXP deal still waiting for China nod - sources
column5: * Pending U.S. tariffs could still hit deal - source (Adds Qualcomm extending cash tender offer to buy NXP shares)

column4: Qualcomm extends cash tender offer to buy NXP shares
column5: Qualcomm Inc has extended by a week its cash tender offer to buy all shares of NXP Semiconductors NV for $44 billion  the chipmaker said on Friday.

column4: Qualcomm extends cash tender offer to buy NXP shares
column5: June 15 Qualcomm Inc has extended by a week its cash tender offer to buy all shares of NXP Semiconductors NV for $44 billion  the chipmaker said on Friday.

column4: US STOCKS-Futures slide as U.S. readies China tariffs
column5: June 15 U.S. stock index futures fell on Friday as the Trump administration prepared to impose tariffs on Chinese goods worth $50 billion that could trigger a countermove from Beijing and escalate trade tensions between the two largest economies.
